title: Layoff announcements this year top 1.1 million, the most since 2020 when pandemic hit, Challenger says
description: The firm said layoff plans totaled 76,835 in November, a step down from October but still enough to bring the 2025 total up to 1.17 million.
content: Announced job cuts from U.S. employers moved further ahead of 1 million for the year in November as corporate restructuring, artificial intelligence and tariffs have helped pare job rolls, consulting… [+2064 chars]
